String1: Web browser extension with information from pepeizqdeals.com
String4: The concept of this extension for your web browser is simple: it adds a box to your games page on Steam, GOG, and the Epic Games Store, using information taken from my website, pepeizqdeals.com.
String5: The information displayed on the box is as follows:
String6: Best deal in euros available for the game on the platform.
String7: A message indicating what its historical minimum price is.
String8: Additional messages indicating whether it is (or has been) included in a bundle, a free promotion to claim, or a subscription service.
